|Title=Know the definitions of children's age groups

Newborn: 0-1 months

Infant: 1 -23 months

Children: 2 years- < puberty

Teenager: > puberty

question.title: What is the correct age range for a child?
question.description: Select the correct age range for a child.

option_a.title: Newborn: 1-23 months
option_a.description: A plausible but incorrect age range for a child.

option_b.title: 1-2 years
option_b.description: A plausible but incorrect age range for a child.

option_c.title: >2 years
option_c.description: A plausible but incorrect age range for a child.

option_d.title: 2 years-<puberty
option_d.description: The correct age range for a child.

correct_option.title: d
correct_option.description: This consists only a letter of the correct option
